properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT R ON M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT R ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT R ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.CONTENT_TYPE= ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT R ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND R.CONTENT_TYPE= ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND C.CONTENT_TYPE = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND C.CONTENT_TYPE = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT M.USER_ID , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TYPE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.VIEW_DATE , R.REVIEW_DATE , R.REVIEW_POINT , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP ON R.TICKET_NO = RP.TICKET_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT M.USER_ID , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND B.BOARD_TYPE = ? )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M.USER_ID , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_ID = ? AND B.BOARD_TYPE = ? )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
